name: Containment (itch) (NotJoshuaa)
description:
Containment is a third person shooter prototype, showing off features such as AI enemies that deal different damage, have different health and hold different weapons. As well as this, the game has a cover mechanic to allow the player to hide behind cover while shooting at enemies. 

The game itself is based off the "Containment" GDD that I created in 2021 as a part of a university assessment. Although, when comparing the GDD and the finished prototype, a lot has been changed and adapted, simply due to the scope of the game and in general gaining better ideas. 

Enjoy the game :) It will most likely not be updated. 

I also have a gameplay video up on YouTube, so feel free to watch it instead of playing. 

JD
